title.rendered: Dr. Dunoma Umar Ahmed, PhD. received in audience, H.E Zdenek Krejci.

content.rendered: The Permanent Secretary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Dr. Dunoma Umar Ahmed, PhD. received in audience, H.E Zdenek Krejci, Ambassador of the Czech Republic, on a courtesy call today 6th August, 2024. Deliberations focused on bilateral relations regarding economic matters – stressing the need for further investments in the non-oil sector, with a focus on harnessing Agricultural prospects. On political matters, the implementation of outstanding MOUs of both countries were discussed with a view to activating a host of them.
